column5: Remodeled barn style home 3 miles from Emory on acres. Property is 4.957 acres and has towering oak trees, small pond, shop & small barn. Home is a 3br 2ba with dining room, utility room. All bedrooms are upstairs. 1 bathroom is upstairs & 1 bathroom is downstairs. Barn style doors on the upstairs bath & master closet. This home has a cozy cabin feel when you walk in! Shown by appointment only.
